extendedInfo.description: Help the Mayor Stay Mayor! Uh oh. Looks like the Mayorâs in a buttload of frigginâ trouble with that alleged video of him smoking crack! And who knows if it even exists, amiright? But juuust in case, why donât you help him collect a heap of cash to buy it before The Gawker does. Only your twinkle toes can out-maneuver the Blood Thirsty Media to help him collect more than  they did in that damn âCrackstarterâ campaign. $201,255 to be exact. And hey, everyone needs a little boost now and then, so make sure you collect power up buckets of deep-fried courage for more footballs to throw at lifeâs problems... but make sure you avoid those pesky crackpipes!Good luck trying to Stay Mayor! Go git em!PS: Donât smoke crack.â Heartbreakingly stunning 2D graphicsâ Fun and easy to playâ Music by award winning composer Sam Allisonâ Made by the same team that brought you the Ikea Monkey Game!â Finally get a bit of control down at city hall using ONLY YOUR THUMB!â Helps numb the painâ Fun and easy to play againâ Almost as funny as Toronto news storiesâ No where near as funny as commenters on Toronto news storiesâ Who are we kidding, this isnât funny. The cityâs management is in shambles and Toronto is a hyper polarized electorate with no hope for change in the next 18 months. ______________________________________FOLLOW US: http://twitter.com/extraextragamesLIKE US: http://www.facebook.com/extraextragames______________________________________

reviews.title: Subways, subways, subways folks
reviews.comment: Folks, this game is fun, fun, fun - I\'m talkin\' Ferris wheels and monorail\'s along the waterfront fun, folks.  Hey you know subways, subways, subways, that\'s what everyone wants.  Football - Vote Ford
reviews.author: Mike Dodds

reviews.title: Law-suit waiting to happen
reviews.comment: This is defamation of character to Mayor Rob Ford, but i doubt he would pay any attention to a garbage game like this, and honestly it makes me want to vote for him
reviews.author: Raymond Pryimak

reviews.title: Entertaining, if only briefly
reviews.comment: Surprisingly well rendered and good looking for something that gets repetitive quickly.
reviews.author: Reay Jespersen

reviews.title: Another far-left liberal progressive..
reviews.comment: ... Attack on a wonderful mayor who has suffered from unproven attacks against him, his business, his family and even his charitable efforts. He\'s done nothing but good for Toronto but because he\'s not a progressive far-left Kool aid drinker the socialist media attack him without fear of consequences because the system is slanted so far left that we\'re in danger of becoming another Venezuela. Harper, Ford and other conservatives can only do so much. Wake up Canada, our social democracy is a road to Greece.
reviews.author: Daniel Mackintosh

reviews.comment: Always felt like the sameexact thing each time I played the game
reviews.author: Brendan Palczynski

reviews.title: Hilarious! !!
reviews.comment: Funniest game I\'ve played in a while!   You need to add in a prime minister who ignores alk the problems and takes him fishing!
reviews.author: Shantel Guttormson

reviews.title: Wtf is this garbage
reviews.comment: I can\'t believe they actually wasted precious living time to create this garbage. I\'m even more upset that I actually played it.
reviews.author: James barthold

reviews.title: repetitive but made me laugh
reviews.comment: the game is very basic but that all said, i think it met its goal.  satire through and through.  good job!
reviews.author: John Hartford

reviews.title: Stuck on loading screen
reviews.comment: Won\'t load on LG nexus 4 or Asus nexus 7.  Stuck on extra games splash screen.
reviews.author: Luc Essiambre

reviews.title: Update fixed display issues
reviews.comment: Ads still leave app stuck at a black screen. Have to turn data off to bypass.
reviews.author: Adam Elfassy

reviews.comment: This is the best game ever for Android. Suck it FORD!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Best game about a morbidly obese, crack smoking, fried chicken eating mayor I\'ve ever played!!!
reviews.author: Mark Kinach

reviews.title: They fixed it.
reviews.comment: The older version wouldn\'t load at all,but now it works just fine. Just avoid that sneaky crack.
reviews.author: Sean Enos

reviews.title: Dave from Scarborough Doesn\'t Approve
reviews.comment: Never change Rob Ford.
reviews.author: Rob Braun

reviews.title: doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Can\'t even start it up. When I try to run it, I get:  java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: bitmap size exceeds VM budget
reviews.author: Ian Kerr

reviews.title: Hilarious
reviews.comment: I\'ll make sure everyone I know plays this game at least once, so glad someone made this
reviews.author: Marlon Taylor

reviews.title: POS
reviews.comment: Crap
reviews.author: Eric Tong

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Eatin chicken and smokin crack
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Booooo
reviews.comment: EVERYTIME I GET DONE WITH THE INSTRUCTIONS AN AD POPS UP AND I PRESS THE X BUT IT TAKES ME RIGHT TO THE PLAY STORE FIX IT NOW!!!!!!!!!!
reviews.author: Makiah Hollis

reviews.title: Off screen
reviews.comment: As far as I can tell it loads fine, but atleast half of what should be displayed is offscreen. On a Rogers HTC One
reviews.author: Joe Frey
